commit.message:
pr47917.c: Make test using POSIX-printf routines on mingw targets.

        * gcc.dg/torture/pr47917.c: Make test using POSIX-printf
        routines on mingw targets.
        * gcc.dg/vect/pr46126.c (size_t): Add support for
        LLP64 target.

From-SVN: r184754

files.patch:

+	* gcc.dg/torture/pr47917.c: Make test using POSIX-printf
+	routines on mingw targets.
+	* gcc.dg/vect/pr46126.c (size_t): Add support for
+	LLP64 target.
